org.smartfrog.services.scripting
Class ScriptPrimImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.RemoteReferenceResolverHelperImpl
      org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.PrimImpl
          org.smartfrog.services.scripting.ScriptPrimImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.rmi.Remote, RemoteScriptPrim, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.MessageKeys, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.RemoteTags, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.RemoteTagsComponent, org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Diagnostics, org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Liveness, org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Prim, org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Update, org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.RemoteReferenceResolver, org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.RemoteReferenceResolverHelper
public class ScriptPrimImpl
extends org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.PrimImpl
implements org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Prim, RemoteScriptPrim

ScriptPrimImpl is a SmartFrog component which allows the user to write bits of java code in the description. BeansShell is used to interpret them. It also implements the RemoteBSH which allows bsh scripts to be remotely executed

getScript

public java.io.Reader getScript(java.lang.String script)
Interpret the string passed as a value in the ScriptPrimImpl description. If it's a file, return a reader on this file. If it's the script itself, a reader on the string.

Parameters:
script - the String describing either the script or its URL.
Returns:
a Reader on the script.

sfDeploy

public void sfDeploy()
              throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException,
                     java.rmi.RemoteException
Deploy the ScriptPrimImpl component. It binds the 'prim' string to this instance for the beanshell interpreter. The following attributes are looked up : - If the 'attributesAsVariables' attribute is set to true / "true" in the description, binds all attributes present during deploy phase to their keys for easier use in the interpreter. - If the 'port' attribute is present, starts an htpp daemon on the component's host on the specified port. - If the 'sfScriptCodeBase' attribute is present it will be used to find all the source scripts for all phases. - If the 'sfDeployCode' is present the deploy script is evaluated.

Specified by:
sfDeploy in interface org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Prim
Overrides:
sfDeploy in class org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.PrimImpl
Throws:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException
java.rmi.RemoteException

sfTerminateWith

public void sfTerminateWith(org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.TerminationRecord status)
During termination phase execute the code described within the 'sfTerminateWithCode' attribute. Any exception is caught and left untreated.

Overrides:
sfTerminateWith in class org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.PrimImpl
Parameters:
status - the TerminationRecord for this phase.
